__New(Mode = "")
Creates the instance but does not show the dialog.
__New()
Creates the instance but does not show the dialog.
__New(Name)
Creates a new Menu object.
_Struct is based on AHK_L Objects and supports both, ANSI and UNICODE version, so to use it you will require a href=url target=”http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/viewtopic” name=”http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/viewtopic”.php?t=43049>Lexikos AutoHotkey_L.exe</a or other versions based on it that supports objects.<br><br>new _Struct is used to create new structure.
Individual items can be accessed by their index.
Rows can be accessed by their index, e.g.
Columns can be accessed by their index, e.g.
Individual parts can be accessed by their index.
Individual tabs can be accessed by their index.
The child nodes of a tree node may be accessed by their index, e.g.
Controls may be accessed by their name by using GUI.Name or by their window handle by using GUI.Controls[hwnd] (assuming Name is a string and hwnd is a variable).
The specific properties of the ActiveX control can simply be accessed through this control object as if it were the ActiveX object itself.
